gobblin.data.management.copy

Interface CopyableDataset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dataset
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyDataset, RecursiveCopyableDataset, SinglePartitionCopyableDataset

    public interface CopyableDataset
extends Dataset
    Dataset that supports finding CopyableFiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<CopyableFile> getCopyableFiles(FileSystem targetFs, CopyConfiguration configuration)
      Find all CopyableFiles in this dataset.

      • Methods inherited from interface gobblin.dataset.Dataset

        datasetRoot

    • Method Detail

      • getCopyableFiles

        Collection<CopyableFile> getCopyableFiles(FileSystem targetFs,
                                          CopyConfiguration configuration)
                                   throws IOException
        Find all CopyableFiles in this dataset.

        This method should return a collection of CopyableFile, each describing one file that should be copied to the target. The returned collection should contain exactly one CopyableFile per file that should be copied. Directories are created automatically, the returned collection should not include any directories. See CopyableFile for explanation of the information contained in the CopyableFiles.

        Parameters:
        targetFs - target FileSystem where copied files will be placed.
        configuration - CopyConfiguration for this job. See CopyConfiguration.
        Returns:
        List of CopyableFiles in this dataset.
        Throws:
        IOException
